profileAlternative.name: Haskell Noah
profileAlternative.headline: Yo’s FroYo bites....
profileAlternative.summary:
Manufacturer of quality, innovative, nutritious and delicious freeze dried snacks. Designed for people age 2-70 to enjoy!
Born from 7 years of hand crafted perfection at our R&D Lab in Queens New York.
Initially focused on building a brand to manufacture freeze-dried Frozen Yogurt & Fruit snacks. Using real milk, real probiotics and real fruits. I call my snacks “Yo’s FroYo Bites”, named after my son Yosef.
My snacks are designed to be “Better For You” and to deliver a billion probiotic cultures per bag (per serving) to help promote a healthier digestive gut.
We strive to use the best available ingredients using our best resources.
Our food supply chain was developed always keeping in mind as a “top priority” the elimination of supply waste from our production line to retail and thru to consumer consumption.
Our goal is to be completely vertically integrated by 2025 - 2030 In order to make available the best snacking option to ALL our fellow humans who are now part of our family.
I strive to deliver the best in tastes, health delivery application, innovation, micro snacking and much more....
